typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudsalescustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudsalesaddress
cloudsalescustomer, cloudsalesaddress join(cloudsalescustomer@CustomerID == cloudsalesaddress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = cloudsalescustomer@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate_customer = cloudsalescustomer@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_customer = cloudsalescustomer@UpdatedDate,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate_address = cloudsalesaddress@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate_address = cloudsalesaddress@UpdatedDate
	)) ~> cloudsalescustomerdata
cloudsalescustomerdata derive(created_date = iif(greater(CreatedDate_customer , CreatedDate_address),CreatedDate_customer,CreatedDate_address),
		updated_date = iif(greater(UpdatedDate_customer , UpdatedDate_customer),UpdatedDate_customer,UpdatedDate_address)) ~> datecolumnsderived
datecolumnsderived select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = created_date,
		UpdatedDate = updated_date
	)) ~> cloudsalescustomeraddressfinal
cloudsalescustomeraddressfinal sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudSalesCustomerInformation
